message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $9,500.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value to you, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $8,500 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,000.  Let's see if we can find common ground!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product to you, I believe I can't go beyond $8,750 for the product.
